entry.title: World War II Bombs Hamper Germany's Retreat From Russian Gas
entry.content: A long-submerged problem is complicating Germany’s attempts to wean itself off the vast pipelines pumping gas west from Russia: Over a million tons of weapons and explosives rusting at the bottom of the sea.

entry.title: NATO Advances Sweden, Finland Toward Membership as Fighting Rages in Eastern Ukraine
entry.content: Ukrainian troops repelled a Russian attack on one of Ukraine’s last lines of defense to protect the remaining Kyiv-held strongholds in eastern Ukraine, while the North Atlantic Treaty Organization advanced plans to add Sweden and Finland to the alliance in the face of Russian aggression in Ukraine.
